scripts.dev:publisher: npm -w @unblock/common run build && cross-env AGENT_MODE=publisher npm -w apps/agent run dev
scripts.dev:subscriber: npm -w @unblock/common run build && cross-env AGENT_MODE=subscriber npm -w apps/agent run dev
scripts.dev:supervisor: npm -w @unblock/common run build && cross-env AGENT_MODE=supervisor npm -w apps/agent run dev
scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run build
scripts.build: npm -w packages/common run build && npm -w apps/server run build && npm -w apps/agent run build
scripts.typecheck: npm -w packages/common run typecheck && npm -w apps/server run typecheck && npm -w apps/agent run typecheck
